description: Arthur has been an only child for eight years and has just found out that a little sister is on the way. At first, Arthur is unhappy about the many ways in which her arrival will disrupt his life. He changes his tune after he holds her for the first time. Illustrations support the text.
meta: blankets, diapers, grabs, share, tickling, yuck
Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions
Cause and Effect : Identify cause and effect
Sound Discrimination : Discriminate short /a/ and long /a/ vowels
Open Vowels : Read and identify open /y/ vowel words
Exclamatory Sentences : Understand the use of and identify exclamatory sentences
Question Words : Recognize and use question words
